name: FEV1FVCTestsSNOMEDCT
title: FEV1/FVC Tests, SNOMEDCT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Management of COPD),(Data Element Scope: Represents SNOMEDCT codes for FEV1/FVC tests),(Inclusion Criteria: Represents SNOMEDCT codes for FEV1/FVC tests),(Exclusion Criteria: n/a)
